T02vadhdhju:4: evaṃ mayā śrutamekasmin samaye bhagavān kośāmbyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ kaṇṭakasaṃjñake mahāvanavare
T02vadhdhju:8: tena punaḥ khalu samayena kauśāmbyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ sucandro nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati sma /
T02vadhdhju:9: upaśāntendriya upaśāntamānaso bahupoṣyo bahuputro bahuduhitṛko bahubhṛtyaparijanasampannaḥ śrāddho mahāśrāddhaḥ kalyāṇāśayaḥ [yena] bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ
T02vadhdhju:10: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ anekaśatasahasrapradakṣaṇīkṛtyaikānte nyaṣīdat /
T02vadhdhju:12: pṛccheyamahaṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgataṃ arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ kiñcit pradeśaṃ sacet me bhagavānavakāśaṃ kuryāt pṛṣṭapraśnavyākaraṇāya /
T02vadhdhju:16: evamukte sucandro gṛhapatiḥ sādhu bhagavanniti kṛtvā bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhagavantametadavocat /
T02vadhdhju:17: kathaṃ bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daridro bhūtvā adaridro bhavati vyādhitaśca bhūtvā avyādhito bhavati /
T02vadhdhju:18: atha khalu bhagavān jānanneva sucandraṃ gṛhapatimetadavocat /
T02vadhdhju:19: kimiti tvaṃ [gṛhapate daridratāyāḥ paripraśnaṃ pṛcchasi evamukte] gṛhapatirbhagavantaṃ etadavocat /
T02vadhdhju:20: daridro 'haṃ bhagavan daridro 'haṃ sugata bahupoṣyo bahuputro bahuduhitṛko bahubhṛtyaparijanasaṃpannaśca /
T02vadhdhju:21: taddarśayatu bhagavāṃstādṛśaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ yena daridrāḥ sattvāḥ adaridrāḥ bhaveyuḥ
T02vadhdhju:22: vyādhitāśca sattvā avyādhitā bhaveyuḥ bahudhanadhānyakośakoṣṭāgārasampannāśca bhaveyuḥ
T02vadhdhju:23: priyā manāpāśca manojñāḥ saṃdarśanīyāśca bhaveyuḥ dānapatayo mahādānapatayaśca akṣīṇahiraṇyasuvarṇadhanadhānyaratnakośakoṣṭāgārāśca bhaveyuḥ
T02vadhdhju:27: asti gṛhapate teṣvapi asaṃkhyeyeṣu kalpeṣvatīteṣu pramāṇeṣu yadāsīt tena kālena tena samayena bhagavān vajradharasāgaranirghoṣo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka utpāta(di)
T02vadhdhju:28: vidyācaraṇasampanno lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
T02vadhdhju:29: tasya tathāgatasyāntikānmayā gṛhapate ayaṃ vasudhārā nāma dhāriṇī śrutā śrutvā copagṛhītā
T02vadhdhju:30: dhāritā vācitā paryavāptā pravarttitā prakīrttitā anumoditā parebhyaśca vistareṇa
T02vadhdhju:31: saṃprakāśitā ahamapyetarhi gṛhapate tāṃ dhāriṇīṃ bhāṣiṣye yathā asyā dhāriṇyāḥ prabhāvena
T02vadhdhju:32: kulaputraṃ mānuṣā na viheṭhayanti amānuṣāḥ ... yakṣāḥ ... rākṣasāḥ ... pretāḥ ...
T02vadhdhju:34: skandā ... apasmārā ... ustā ... pūtanā ... kaṭapūtanā ... yātudhānā na viheṭhayanti /
T02vadhdhju:35: mūtrāhārā rūdhirāhārā viṣṭāhārā vasāhārā māṃsāhārā śleṣmāhārā pūāhārā siṃhāṇakāhārā
T02vadhdhju:36: khelāhārā medhāhārā madyāhārā jātāhārā jīvitāhārā balyāhārā mālyāhārā yāvaducchiṣṭāhārā na viheṭhayanti /
T02vadhdhju:37: yasya ceyaṃ gṛhapate dhāriṇī śrāddhasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā hṛdayagatā
T02vadhdhju:38: hastagatā śrutimātragatā paryavāptā pravarttitā prakīrtitā viciṃtitā dhāritā vācitā
T02vadhdhju:39: likhitā anumoditā parebhyaśca saṃprakāśitā ca bhaviṣyati tasya kulaputrasya kuladuhiturvā
T02vadhdhju:40: dīrgharātraṃ arthāya sukhāya hitāya kṣemāya subhikṣāya yogasaṃbhārāya bhaviṣyati /
T02vadhdhju:42: udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā namaskṛtvā arcayet ardharātreścaturvārān tasya devatā āttamanaskāḥ
T02vadhdhju:44: pātayiṣyanti tāḥ prītāstathāgataśāsane prītā buddhaprajñaptyā prītā saṃghaprajñaptyā
T02vadhdhju:47: om namo bhagavate vajradharasāgaranirghoṣāya tathāgatasyārhate samyaksaṃbuddhāya
T02vadhdhju:48: tadyathā om śrī surūpe suvadane bhadre subhadre bhadravati maṃgale sumaṃgale maṃgalavati
T02vadhdhju:49: argale argalavati candre candravati ale acale acapale udghātini udbhedini ucchedini
T02vadhdhju:50: udyotini śasyavati dhanavati dhānyavati udyotavati śrīmati prabhavati amale vimale
T02vadhdhju:51: nirmale rurume surūpe surupavimale arcanaste atanaste vitanaste anunaste (?)
T02vadhdhju:52: avanatahaste viśvakeśi viśvaniśi viśvanaṃśi viśvarūpiṇi viśvanakhi viśvaśire viśuddhaśīle
T02vadhdhju:53: vigūhanīye viśuddhanīye uttare anuttare aṃkure naṃkure prabhaṃkure rarame ririme
T02vadhdhju:54: rurume khakhame khikhime khukhume dhadhame dhidhime dhudhume tatare tatare ture ture
T02vadhdhju:55: tara tara tāraya tāraya māṃsarvasattvāṃśca vajre vajre vajragarbhe vajropame vajriṇi
T02vadhdhju:56: vajravati ukke bukke nukke dhukke kakke hakke ḍhakke ṭakke varakke āvarttini nivarttini
T02vadhdhju:57: nivarṣaṇi pravarṣaṇi vardhani pravardhani niṣpādani vajradharasāgaranirghoṣaṃ tathāgataṃ
T02vadhdhju:58: anusmara anusmara sarvatathāgatasatyamanusmara saṃghasatyamanusmara anihāri anihāri
T02vadhdhju:59: tapa tapa kuṭa kuṭa pūra pūra pūraya pūraya bhagavati vasudhāre mama saparivārasya
T02vadhdhju:60: sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ ca bhara bhara bharaṇi (Vdh-J_40)
T02vadhdhju:61: śāntamati jayamati mahāmati sumaṃgalamati piṃgalamati subhadramati śubhamati candramati āgacchāgaccha samayamanusmara svāhā /
T02vadhdhju:64: sarvatathāgatānāṃ vinayaṃ ... hṛdayaṃ ... upahṛdayaṃ ... jayaṃ ... vijayaṃ ... sarvasatvavijayamanusmara svāhā /
T02vadhdhju:89: mā dūragāminī anutpannānāṃ dravyāṇāmutpādini utpannānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ vṛddhiṃkari truṭe liṭe liṭe li ita ita āgacchāgaccha bhagavati mā vilambaṃ manorathaṃ me paripūraya /
T02vadhdhju:90: daśabhyo digbhyo yathodakadhārā paripūrayanti mahīṃ yathā tamāṃsi bhāskaro raśminā vidhyāpayati ciraṃtanāni yathā śaśī śītāṃśunā niṣpādayatyauṣadhīḥ
T02vadhdhju:95: tadyathā / suṭa suṭa khaṭa khaṭa khiṭi khiṭi khuṭu khuṭu maru maru muṃca muṃca maruñca
T02vadhdhju:96: maruñca tarppiṇi tarppiṇi tarjani tarjani dehi dehi dāpaya dāpaya uttiṣṭa uttiṣṭa
T02vadhdhju:108: utpādayantu me kāṃkṣāvirahaṃ anumodayantu imaṃ me mantrapadāḥ /
T02vadhdhju:109: om hraṃ hrīṃ ehyehi bhagavati dada dāpaya svāhā /
T02vadhdhju:110: etadbhagavatyā āryavasudhārāyā hṛdayaṃ mahāpāpakariṇo 'pi siddhyati puruṣapramāṇān
T02vadhdhju:111: svabhogān dadāti īpsitaṃ manorathaṃ paripūrayati kāmaduhān yān kāmān kāmayati tāṃstānīpsitān paripūrayati /
T02vadhdhju:114: namo devi dhanadaduhite vasudhāre dhanadhārāṃ pātaya kuru 2 dhaneśvarī dhanade ratnade
T02vadhdhju:116: praviśya matpuraṃ madbhavane mahādhanadhānyadhārāṃ pātaya kuru 2 om hraṃ traṭa kailāsavāsinīye svāhā /
T02vadhdhju:120: om vasudhāre sarvārthasādhinī sādhaya 2 uddhara 2 rakṣa 2 /
T02vadhdhju:121: sarvārthanidhayantraṃ vava ṭata vava ṭaṇṭa ḍaṇḍa svāhā /
T02vadhdhju:123: om namo bhagavatyai āryalevaḍike yathā jīvasaṃrakṣaṇi phalahaste divyarūpe dhanade
T02vadhdhju:124: varade śuddhe viśuddhe śivakari śāntikari bhayanāśini bhayadūṣaṇi sarvaduṣṭān bhañjaya
T02vadhdhju:125: 2 mohaya 2 jambhaya 2 stambhaya 2 mama śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ vaśyaṃ rakṣāṃ ca kuru 2 svāhā /
T02vadhdhju:127: iyaṃ sā gṛhapate imāni vasudhārādhāriṇīmantrapadāni sarvatathāgatānāṃ arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ
T02vadhdhju:128: pūjāṃ kṛtvā ṣaṇmāsānnāvartayet tataḥ siddhā bhavati yasmiṃśca sthāne iyaṃ mahāvidyā
T02vadhdhju:130: bhavati pauṣṭikakāryaṃ svagṛhe paragṛhe vā bhagavatastathāgatasyāryāvalokiteśvarasya
T02vadhdhju:131: ca mantradevatāyāścāgrataḥ sarvabuddhabodhisattvebhyo namaskṛtvā śubhe sthāne kośe
T02vadhdhju:132: koṣṭāgāre vā candanena caturasramaṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā trīn vārān āvartayan tato gṛhapate
T02vadhdhju:133: kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā mahāpuruṣamātrayā vasudhārayā gṛhaṃ paripūrayati sarvadhanadhānyahiraṇyasuvarṇaratnaiḥ
T02vadhdhju:135: tena hi tvaṃ gṛhapate udgṛgṛhīṣvemāṃ vasudhārā nāma dhāriṇīṃ dhāraya vācaya deśaya
T02vadhdhju:136: udgrāhaya paryavāpnuhi pravartaya anumodaya parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśaya tad
T02vadhdhju:137: bhaviṣyati dīrgharātraṃ arthāya hitāya subhikṣāya kṣemāya yogasambhārāya ceti /
T02vadhdhju:138: sādhu bhagavanniti sucandro gṛhapatiḥ bhagavato 'ntikādimāṃ vasudhārāṃ nāma dhāriṇīṃ
T02vadhdhju:139: śrutvā hṛṣṭaḥ tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhagavataścaraṇayornipatya
T02vadhdhju:141: udgṛhītā me bhagavan iyaṃ vasudhārā nāma dhāriṇī prakīrtitā dhāritā vācitā paryavāptā anumoditā manasānupariciṃtitā ca parebhyaśca vistareṇa idānīṃ samprakāśayiṣyāmīti /
T02vadhdhju:142: atha tatkṣaṇamātreṇa sucandro nāma gṛhapati[ḥ] paripūrṇakośakoṣṭāgāro babhūva /
T02vadhdhju:143: atha khalu sucandro gṛhapatiḥ bhagavantaṃ anekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya
T02vadhdhju:144: bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ anekaśaḥ punaḥ punaravalokya bhagavato
T02vadhdhju:146: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantrayate sma /
T02vadhdhju:147: gaccha tvaṃ ānaṃda sucandrasya gṛhapateragāraṃ gatvā ca paripūrṇaṃ paśya sarvadhanadhānyahiraṇyaratnasuvarṇaiḥ sarvopakaraṇairmahākośakoṣṭāgārāṇi ca paripūrṇāni /
T02vadhdhju:148: atha khalvāyuṣmān ānaṃdo bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yena kośāmbīmahānagarī yena sucandrasya gṛhapateragāraṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
T02vadhdhju:149: upasaṃkramyābhyantaraṃ praviśyādrākṣīt tat paripūrṇaṃ sarvadhanadhānyahiraṇyasuvarṇaiḥ sarvopakaraṇaiśca (Vdh-J_43)
T02vadhdhju:151: dṛṣṭvā ca vismito hṛṣṭaḥ santuṣṭaḥ udagra āttamanā pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto yena bhagavāṃstena upasaṃkrāntaḥ /
T02vadhdhju:153: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo 'sya yena sucandro gṛhapatirmahādhano mahābhogo mahākośakoṣṭāgāraḥ sarvadhanadhānyasamṛddhaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
T02vadhdhju:156: udgṛhītā ca teneyaṃ vasudhārā nāma dhāriṇī dhāritā vācitā deśitā grāhitā paryavāptā prakīrtitā anumoditā idānīṃ parebhyaśca saṃprakāśayiṣyati
T02vadhdhju:157: tena cānaṃda tvamapyudgṛhīṣvemāṃ vasudhārā nāma dhāriṇīṃ dhāraya vācaya deśaya grāhaya paryavāpnuhi pravarttaya prakīrtaya anumodaya parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśaya /
T02vadhdhju:158: yasyeyaṃ kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā hastagatā gṛhagatā pustakagatā bhaviṣyati
T02vadhdhju:159: na tasya rogadurbhikṣamarakakāṃtārādayo bhaviṣyanti krameṇa vibhavāstasya pravardhiṣyanti
T02vadhdhju:160: tad bhaviṣyati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya
T02vadhdhju:162: nāhaṃ ānaṃda taṃ dharme samanupaśyāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ
T02vadhdhju:163: prajāyāṃ sadevamānuṣāsurāyāṃ ca imāṃ vasudhārā nāma dhāriṇīṃ mahāvidyāṃ anyathā kariṣyati
T02vadhdhju:166: abhedyā hyete ānaṃda vasudhārādhāriṇīmantrā na vaite kṣīṇakuśalamūlānāṃ sattvānāṃ śrutipatha[mapyā]gamiṣyanti kaḥ punarvādo pustakagatāmapi kṛtvā gṛhe (Vdh-J_44)
T02vadhdhju:169: sarvatathāgatānāṃ hyetad vākyaṃ sarvatathāgataireṣā dhāriṇī bhāṣitā adhiṣṭhitā svamudrikayā
T02vadhdhju:170: mudritā prabhāvitā prakāśitā prakīrtitā anumoditā praśastā saṃvartitā vivṛtottānīkṛtā
T02vadhdhju:171: ārocitā svākhyātā sunirdiṣṭā ca sarvasattvānāṃ daridrāṇāṃ nānāvyādhiparipīḍitānāṃ
T02vadhdhju:173: ānanda āha / udgṛhītā me bhagavanniyaṃ vasudhārā nāma dhāriṇī dhāritā vācitā grāhitā deśitā pravarttitā prakīrtitā anumoditā manasā supariciṃtitā
T02vadhdhju:174: atha khalvāyuṣmān ānaṃda utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇajānumaṇḍalaṃ
T02vadhdhju:175: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāṃjaliṃ praṇamya tasyāṃ velāyāṃ kṛtakarapuṭo
T02vadhdhju:181: atha khalvāyuṣmān ānaṃdo hṛṣṭa tuṣṭa āttamanā pramuditā prītisaumanasyajāto bhagavantametadavocat /
T02vadhdhju:182: ko nāma bhagavan dharmaparyāyaḥ kaścemāṃ dhārayāmi /
T02vadhdhju:184: tena hi tvamānaṃda sucandragṛhapatiparipṛcchetyapi dhāraya sarvadhanadhānyamityapi dhāraya sarvatathāgatapraśarato vasudhārādhāriṇīkalpaṃ ityapi dhāraya /
T02vadhdhju:185: idamavocad bhagavannāttamanā āyuṣmān ānaṃdaste ca bhikṣavaste ca bodhisatvā sā sarvāvatī parṣad sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvāśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanaṃdanniti /
T02vadhdhju:194: sāhaśrī pamanīyāsuta sāhaśrī indrajī suṃdara paṭhanārthe paropakārārtham //
